ValidationRule.description: If the provider is a trainee, the Name of School must be specified. This validation fires only if the current time is greater than or equal to Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), isBlank(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c) ), ISPICKVAL( The_provider_is_a_Trainee__c , 'Yes'), ISBLANK(Name_of_School__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the Name of School if the provider is marked as a Trainee.
